name: auto-ml
description: AutoML integration containing both the backend (Python) and frontend (TypeScript)

scripts.postinstall: pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ui && npm install
scripts.serve: concurrently 'watchmedo auto-restart -d . -R -p "*.py" -- python -u server.py' 'cd ui && npm run start' 'rabbitmq-server' '> .tasks.json && watchmedo auto-restart -d . -R -p "*.py" -- celery -E -A worker --pool=solo worker' 'sleep 15s && open http://localhost:4200'

author: Samer Albahra
